attributes.title: [Second Wind] Cloak and... - C02 - Ep 17
attributes.caption:
Welcome to ""Second Wind"" - The Tales From The Stinky Dragon Bonus Show where we deep dive into the latest episode, talk player decisions, DM secrets, and more!

In this episode join Gus and Jon as they discuss security measures in the Library, why the party members are getting their butts handed to them in combat this campaign, and how Gus handles narrative acrobatics around D&D combat.
attributes.description:

attributes.title: [Second Wind] Sphoenix From The Ashes - C02 - Ep 19
attributes.caption: In this week's ""Second Wind"", Jon, Barbara, and Micah talk about what it takes to make the show, homebrew options for creating monsters and characters, and how to start writing a D&D campaign. Check out the tool Micah mentioned over at https://giffyglyph.com/monstermaker/app/

attributes.title: [Second Wind] Karcasuuk Coup - Between the Tales - C02 Ep 19.5
attributes.caption: In this week's ""Second Wind"" Blaine, Barbara, Gus, & Micah sit down to talk about the ""Karcasuuk Coup"" arc, how the DM team anticipates actions of the players, and compare how easily the Grotethe players trust strangers compared to the Infinight party.
attributes.description:
In this week's ""Second Wind"" Blaine, Barbara, Gus, & Micah sit down to talk about the ""Karcasuuk Coup"" arc, how the DM team anticipates actions of the players, and compare how easily the Grotethe players trust strangers compared to the Infinight party. 

Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/roosterteeth

Check out our merch and follow us on Twitter, Instagram, TikTok and more: https://linktr.ee/TalesFromTheStinkyDragon
